word_mean: 中柱：植物维管组织的圆柱形中央髓部，由中柱鞘和其中的木质部、韧皮部和薄璧组织组成

sentence.Network_en: The pith of this stemlike stele appears rather strongly like collenchyma tissue.
sentence.Network_cn: 茎状中柱的髓显得颇强健,像厚角组织.

sentence.Network_en: The stele includes all primary tissues derived from the procambium consists of pericycle, phloem and xylem.
sentence.Network_cn: 中柱包括从原形成层衍生而来的全部初生组织,由中柱鞘 、 韧质部和木质部组成.

sentence.Network_en: A stele that has a solid core of vascular tissue.
sentence.Network_cn: 原生中柱一种有管状组织的实心中柱.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Greek stēlē 'standing block'

means.word_mean: 1. the usually cylindrical central vascular portion of the axis of a vascular plant
2. an ancient upright stone slab bearing markings

auth_sentence.content: For larger shipments, he hid his rolls of film under the stele of what he pretended was a family grave.
